channel.title: NTP RCE - for real?
channel.description:
Hi folks,
I did a lot of research the past days about vulnerabilities in NTP and came across several scripts for DoS attacks.
However, I've read as well one some pages that "there are NTP RCE attacks" in the wild.
Has anyone knowledge about this? As said, I read all I could find but didn't find any more information than "that it is out there". Nothing specific.
I'd appreciate if anyone knows some resources to study.
Thanks and you all have a great week

item.title: NTP RCE - for real?
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic

item.title: NTP RCE - for real?
item.dc:creator: TR99
item.description:
Have you tried the CVE page? Might not have any recent vulnerabilities that could be being used for attacks.

https://www.cvedetails.com/vulnerability-list/vendor_id-2153/NTP.html

Read full topic

Hi folks,
